because it wasnt directed towards him, and pin pointing every evil robot on 
the planet is useless. As Evil is all in the eye of the beholder. Meaning the 
Infectcions are really good guys, as are the decepts and everyone he cant 
just pick one evil bot out of an entire planet of them. Also he wouldnt to it 
anyway since the infecticons dont draw energy from the pit. They get it 
somewhere else. In other words, SS cant find the mysterious bot.

--part1_3e.14cb9b0f.292c63c6_boundary
